Key Match Events: Mookie Betts hit a solo home run in the first inning, the first of his two long balls
Shohei Ohtani hit an RBI single
Will Smith and Gavin Lux each hit a two-run homer
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Padres won 10-2 at Dodger Stadium in Game 2 on Sunday night, when tempers flared on the field and in the stands
The winner will have home-field advantage in the National League Championship Series against the New York Mets
Others: The Dodgers got a superb effort by opener Ryan Brasier and seven fellow relievers in a bullpen game
The Padresâ€™ gamble to start Cease on short rest backfired
The Dodgers hushed the Petco Park-record crowd of 47,773 that had hoped to see San Diego eliminate LA in the NLDS for the second time in three seasons
